According to Plato, true justice can be found in
options: When the peasants, soldiers and guardians perform the specific duties they are trained to perform
When the soldiers take the place of peasants
When the guardians perform the work of the soldiers
When both the peasants and soldiers take up the activities of the guardians
correct: When the peasants, soldiers and guardians perform the specific duties they are trained to perform

question: Which of the following best describes the goal of metaphysics?

correct: Exploring the ultimate nature of reality
